mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_NO, A.MEMBER_NAME, A.EMAIL_ID, A.TEL, A.BIRTHDAY, A.JOINED_AT, A.MODIFIED_AT, A.STATUS, A.DAYOFF_COUNT, A.PW, A.PROFILE_FILE_PATH, A.PROFILE_FILE_NAME, A.DEPT_NAME, A.JOB_NAME FROM (SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.EMAIL_ID, M.TEL, M.BIRTHDAY, M.JOINED_AT, M.MODIFIED_AT, M.STATUS, M.DAYOFF_COUNT, M.PW, M.PROFILE_FILE_PATH, M.PROFILE_FILE_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, J.JOB_NAME FROM DEPARTMENT_T D INNER JOIN MEMBER_T M ON D.DEPT_NO = M.DEPT_NO INNER JOIN JOB_T J ON J.JOB_NO = M.JOB_NO) A WHERE A.EMAIL_ID = #{emailId} AND A.PW = #{pw}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_T SET AUTOLOGIN_ID = NULL , AUTOLOGIN_EXPIRED_AT = NULL WHERE EMAIL_ID = #{emailId}
